This account bears the admin role (for the granted role). Expected in cases where the role was granted using the internal {AccessControl-_grantRole}."},"RoleRevoked(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is revoked `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call:   - if using `revokeRole`, it is the admin role bearer   - if using `renounceRole`, it is the role bearer (i.e. `account`)"},"Unpaused(address)":{"details":"Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`."},"Upgraded(address)":{"details":"Emitted when the implementation is upgraded."}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"claimVestedTokens(uint256)":{"details":"Allows beneficiary to claim released tokens from a schedule","params":{"scheduleId":"ID of the vesting schedule"},"returns":{"_0":"The amount of tokens claimed"}},"createVestingSchedule(address,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Creates a vesting schedule for a beneficiary","params":{"allocationId":"ID of the allocation in TokenVault","beneficiary":"Address to receive vested tokens","cliffDuration":"Duration in seconds until first tokens unlock","duration":"Total duration of vesting in seconds","startTime":"Unix timestamp when vesting begins","totalAmount":"Total amount of tokens to vest"},"returns":{"_0":"scheduleId Unique identifier for the vesting schedule"}},"createVestingScheduleV2(address,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Creates a new vesting schedule and tracks it in V2 counter","params":{"amount":"Total amount of tokens to vest","beneficiary":"Address to receive vested tokens","cliffDuration":"Duration in seconds until first tokens unlock","duration":"Total duration of vesting in seconds","slicePeriodSeconds":"Duration of each vesting slice in seconds","startTime":"Unix timestamp when vesting begins"},"returns":{"_0":"scheduleId Unique identifier for the vesting schedule"}},"getClaimedTokens()":{"details":"Returns the total amount of tokens that have been claimed","returns":{"totalClaimed":"Total amount of tokens that have been claimed"}},"getRoleAdmin(bytes32)":{"details":"Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}."},"getSchedulesForBeneficiary(address)":{"details":"Returns all vesting schedules for a beneficiary","params":{"beneficiary":"Address to check schedules for"},"returns":{"_0":"scheduleIds Array of schedule IDs for the beneficiary"}},"getTotalVestedV2()":{"details":"Returns the total amount vested through V2","returns":{"_0":"The total amount vested using V2 functions"}},"getVersion()":{"details":"Returns the current version number","returns":{"_0":"The version number (2 for V2)"}},"getVestedToken()":{"details":"Returns the total amount of tokens that have been vested","returns":{"totalVested":"Total amount of tokens that have been vested"}},"getVestingInfo(uint256)":{"details":"Returns vesting info for a schedule","params":{"scheduleId":"ID of the vesting schedule"},"returns":{"nextUnlockTime":"Unix timestamp of next unlock (or 0 if fully vested)","releasableAmount":"Amount of tokens currently releasable","releasedAmount":"Amount of tokens already released","remainingAmount":"Amount of tokens still locked","totalAmount":"Total amount of tokens in the schedule"}},"getVestingSchedule(uint256)":{"details":"Returns vesting schedule details","params":{"scheduleId":"ID of the vesting schedule"},"returns":{"_0":"VestingSchedule structure with all details"}},"grantRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event."},"hasRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Returns `true` if `account` has been granted `role`."},"initialize(address,address,address)":{"details":"Initializes the contract replacing the constructor for upgradeable contracts","params":{"_admin":"Address of the admin","_tokenVault":"Address of the TokenVault contract","_ttnToken":"Address of the TTNToken contract"}},"initializeV2()":{"custom:oz-upgrades-validate-as-initializer":"","details":"Initializes V2 functionality This is called during the upgrade process"},"manualUnlock(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Manually unlocks tokens from a vesting schedule","params":{"amount":"Amount of tokens to unlock","scheduleId":"ID of the vesting schedule"},"returns":{"_0":"success Whether the manual unlock was successful"}},"pause()":{"details":"Pauses vesting operations"},"paused()":{"details":"Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise."},"proxiableUUID()":{"details":"Implementation of the ERC-1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier."},"renounceRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"revokeRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"revokeSchedule(uint256)":{"details":"Revokes a vesting schedule","params":{"scheduleId":"ID of the vesting schedule to revoke"},"returns":{"_0":"The amount of assigned tokens revoked."}},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"details":"See {IERC165-supportsInterface}."},"unpause()":{"details":"Unpauses vesting operations"},"upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes)":{"custom:oz-upgrades-unsafe-allow-reachable":"delegatecall","details":"Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event."}},"version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"initialize(address,address,address)":{"notice":"Can only be called muBE5eZ3F5whYAkAGzCNNoEWB"]},"node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/StorageSlot.sol":{"keccak256":"0xcf74f855663ce2ae00ed8352666b7935f6cddea2932fdf2c3ecd30a9b1cd0e97","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://9f660b1f351b757dfe01438e59888f31f33ded3afcf5cb5b0d9bf9aa6f320a8b","dweb:/ipfs/QmarDJ5hZEgBtCmmrVzEZWjub9769eD686jmzb2XpSU1cM"]},"node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/introspection/IERC165.sol":{"keccak256":"0x79796192ec90263f21b464d5bc90b777a525971d3de8232be80d9c4f9fb353b8","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://f6fda447a62815e8064f47eff0dd1cf58d9207ad69b5d32280f8d7ed1d1e4621","dweb:/ipfs/QmfDRc7pxfaXB2Dh9np5Uf29Na3pQ7tafRS684wd3GLjVL"]}},"version":1}

claimVestedTokens(uint256).details: Allows beneficiary to claim released tokens from a schedule

createVestingSchedule(address,uint256,ui.details: Creates a vesting schedule for a beneficiary

params.allocationId: ID of the allocation in TokenVault
params.cliffDuration: Duration in seconds until first tokens unlock
params.duration: Total duration of vesting in seconds
params.totalAmount: Total amount of tokens to vest

returns._0: scheduleId Unique identifier for the vesting schedule

createVestingScheduleV2(address,uint256,.details: Creates a new vesting schedule and tracks it in V2 counter

params.amount: Total amount of tokens to vest
params.cliffDuration: Duration in seconds until first tokens unlock
params.duration: Total duration of vesting in seconds
params.slicePeriodSeconds: Duration of each vesting slice in seconds

returns._0: scheduleId Unique identifier for the vesting schedule

getClaimedTokens().details: Returns the total amount of tokens that have been claimed

returns.totalClaimed: Total amount of tokens that have been claimed

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

getSchedulesForBeneficiary(address).details: Returns all vesting schedules for a beneficiary

returns._0: scheduleIds Array of schedule IDs for the beneficiary

getTotalVestedV2().details: Returns the total amount vested through V2

returns._0: The total amount vested using V2 functions

getVestedToken().details: Returns the total amount of tokens that have been vested

returns.totalVested: Total amount of tokens that have been vested

getVestingInfo(uint256).details: Returns vesting info for a schedule

returns.nextUnlockTime: Unix timestamp of next unlock (or 0 if fully vested)
returns.totalAmount: Total amount of tokens in the schedule

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

initialize(address,address,address).details: Initializes the contract replacing the constructor for upgradeable contracts

initializeV2().details: Initializes V2 functionality This is called during the upgrade process

manualUnlock(uint256,uint256).details: Manually unlocks tokens from a vesting schedule

returns._0: success Whether the manual unlock was successful

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC-1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

params.scheduleId: ID of the vesting schedule to revoke

returns._0: The amount of assigned tokens revoked.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.
